description:
Byakudan Midori is the class president of http://anidb.net/ch21010 [Haruomi], http://anidb.net/ch19271 [Akina], and http://anidb.net/ch21728 [Suzuran]`s class and a long-time friend of Suzuran`s. She is calm, collected, and intelligent, but also a little domineering. Midori often quotes famous proverbs, quotes, and sayings. For some reason, she treats Haruomi like an enemy.
Source: VNDB
name: Byakudan Midori
